videos.title: Mastering the STAR Method
what_you_will_learn: The STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result.
How to structure compelling stories about your experiences.
Answering questions like 'Tell me about a time you failed...'
videos.content_covered: Behavioral questions are designed to assess your soft skills and past performance. The STAR method is the gold standard for providing clear, concise, and impactful answers that showcase your abilities.

videos.title: System Design Intro: TinyURL
what_you_will_learn: The process of scoping a system design problem.
videos.content_covered: System design interviews test your ability to build large-scale systems. We use the classic 'Design a URL shortener' problem to walk through the fundamental steps, from clarifying requirements to handling database scaling and API design.
